ygData.subject: RE: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: the stuff that spawns at night seems to get leftover during the day, tracking is really scary at night when all you can track at the zone is undead stuff. im
ygData.messageBody:
the stuff that spawns at night seems to get leftover during the day,
tracking is really scary at night when all you can track at the zone is
undead stuff. im happy bard quests arent in kith like the rangers are.

ya those enraged dread wolves are nasty, red to me at 36.

Minkin makes a rude gesture to all you rangers out there.
Minkin rolls on the floor laughing his ass off at the rangers.
Minkin gets succered into finding the ranger guildmaster to get a ranger
breastplate for a friend (doh i knew i shouldnt of looted that stuff "just
in case"!)

Minkin Nehoc
Sol Ro
Level 36 bard (for the 4th time)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [SMTP:Dean_Kimes@...]
> Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 3:42 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kith Nerfed!!! Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> >Some things, especially the dread wolves and enraged dread wolves, do NOT
> >always despawn at the morning. This means that often there will be
> several
> >things left in the zone that are still very aggressive and dangerous.
>
> I think they have this fixed as of the last patch. I was in Kith last
> nite
> (Real time) and was targeting an Enraged Dread Wolf to /con it for just
> this
> reason. While I had it targeted it despawned. This was at 6AM KFT
> (Kithicor Forest Time). I ran all over the zone to see if there was
> anything dangerous running around. I did get jumped by a ghoul and nearly
> had heart failure when it rooted me. Fortunately it was one of the
> ordinary
> ghouls that have always spawned near burned out houses in Kithicor. I did
> not run into anything during the day that wasn't around before this
> change.
> Of course I don't have track yet so that info isn't 100% for sure but I
> did
> stay in Kithicor ranging about until 6pm KFT so I covered a lot of ground.
>
> Kitasi
> Still Somewhere in Kithicor
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> with the subject lol.
